data.description: Examines representations of Asian American in American media using historical, analytical, and critical approaches. Issues of cultural production, identity, race, politics, and gender are linked to examinations of specific media forms.
data.title: ASIAN AMERICANS AND MEDIA

data.description: Introduction to the historical, sociological, anthropological, political, and cultural study of Americans of Asian ancestry.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO ASIAN AMERICAN STUDIES
